entry.title: MORNING CONVERSATION 5.6.25
entry.summary: Becky Holm of the Roseburg Optimist Club talks about a special community meeting they are having Tuesday night at 5:30 p.m. at Umpqua Valley Arts with an author whose father was one of 27 doctors to enter the Dachau Concentration Camp in Germany after World War II.

entry.title: Dog Lovers flock to Douglas County for Barks and Recreation
entry.summary: On Saturday, canines big and small took to the grounds of Stewart Park with their owners during Barks and Recreation, a festival by Saving Grace Humane Society dedicated to all things dog.

entry.title: MORNING CONVERSATION 5.5.25
entry.summary: Melrose Elementary School 5th grader Cole Stark is a national finalist in the Future Chefs National Challenge. He is joined by Sodexo at Schools Roseburg Public Schools General Manager Loran Perry to talk about the competition. Voting for Cole can be done once a day through Friday at: https://futurechefschallenge.com/
